body_html: We don't. I think since this is a straightforward extension of existing ops, I don't think there's a huge design space to consider anyway. I'd guess it would go into contrib first, although if it is basically parallel to the 3D ops, we may just add them to core directly.
body_text: We don't. I think since this is a straightforward extension of existing ops, I don't think there's a huge design space to consider anyway. I'd guess it would go into contrib first, although if it is basically parallel to the 3D ops, we may just add them to core directly.
body: We don't. I think since this is a straightforward extension of existing ops, I don't think there's a huge design space to consider anyway. I'd guess it would go into contrib first, although if it is basically parallel to the 3D ops, we may just add them to core directly.
